module.name: grouperpro
module.description: The only module that gives you ability to build extended customers groups. Create Groups of Customers by: age, gender, location, registration, opt-ins, their shopping and carreers experience and much more... Grouper PRO allows you to schedule Groups re-build: Every Group may have its own schedule settings.
module.author: Terranet
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall it?
